name: Mesozooplankton abundance from 1959-2017 in the Middle Adriatic Sea
description: Monthly mesoozooplankton samplings started in 1959, performed by vertical tows of Hensennet (73 cm mouth diameter,330 Î¼m mesh size)from 100â0 m at towing speed of 0.3 m s-1. Sampleswere fixed in 2 % formaldehyde solution buffered with borax. No flowmeter was used. From1959-2017mesozooplankton was sampled on approximatelymonthly basis and data are available from March 1959to December 2017 (withgaps) and includethe abundances expressed as no.ind.m-3 at group level of the zooplankton groups such as Copepoda, Cladocera, Appendicularia,Chaetognatha, Tunicata, Ostracoda, Polychaeta, Decapodalarvae, various meroplankton larvae,Pisces ova, Pisces larvae and Hydromedusae/Siphonophora. From 2004 - 2012 the samplingprogram was interrupted. The samples from 2012 - 2016are currently being processed and not yetpart of this series.
